pepreporting 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference

    • Beach Pathogens

Import raw water quality data

read_pepwq.Rd

Impot raw water quality data

read_pepwq(path)

Arguments

path

chr string of path for excel file

Value

data.frame

Details

Raw data from here https://gisportal.suffolkcountyny.gov/gis/home/item.html?id=8107f192ffac406380b6d61d3d3dbf7d

See also

Other read: read_pepent()

Examples

path <- system.file("extdata", "currentdata.xlsx", package="pepreporting")
dat <- read_pepwq(path)
dat
